doc.ContractDescription: IGF::CT::IGF A-E CONTRACTOR WILL PROVIDE THE DEVELOPMENT OF A SITE SURVEY AND BED-DOWN PLAN, GEOTECHNICAL AND TOPOGRAPHIC STUDIES, AND THE PREPARATION OF DESIGNS FOR CONSTRUCTION DOCUMENTS FOR FACILITIES, PAVEMENTS, AND SUPPORTING INFRASTRUCTURE AT THE ROYAL COMMISSION AIR BASE IN JUBAIL. THE SITE SURVEY AND BED-DOWN PLAN (SITE PLANNING) WILL INCLUDE CONSIDERATIONS FOR THE SPECIFICS OF THE MH-60 R, BUT ALSO WILL CONSIDER FUTURE REQUIREMENTS FOR OTHER FUTURE PLATFORMS TO SUPPORT THE ROYAL SAUDI NAVAL FORCES MODERNIZATION PROGRAM (FIXED WING RECONNAISSANCE AIRCRAFT, UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES, AND OTHER SUPPORT EQUIPMENTS).
